SELECT count(cc.id) FROM zgk_user_collect cc LEFT JOIN gk_university uu ON cc.projectId = uu.id LEFT JOIN gk_university_dict dd ON uu.property=dd.dictId AND dd.type='FEATURE'
AND cc.type = '1' AND cc.userId = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zgk_user_collect WHERE userId = #{userId} AND projectId = #{projectId}

SELECT cc.id as id,cc.projectId as courseId,vc.frontCover as frontCover,vc.title as title,vc.teacher as teacherName FROM zgk_user_collect cc LEFT JOIN zgk_video_course vc ON cc.projectId = vc.id WHERE cc.userId = #{userId} AND cc.type = '2' ORDER BY cc.id desc
limit ${offset}, ${rows}
